introduction: Ana Flaherty is a graphic designer who combines illustration and fine art skills to create standout, visually striking pieces for clients and businesses.

contact.button: If you’d like to request a custom piece
contact.message: If you’re interested in this item, please make your purchase here
contact.label: CONTACT

about.label: ABOUT ME
about.value: My passion for art began with my passion for storytelling. I want my art to convey an emotion and a story. My background is in fine arts and traditional media. But I soon became drawn to the world of graphic design. Graphic design allows me to create something that the client loves and allows me to take risks.

education.label: EDUCATION
values: Bachelor of Science Degree in Graphic Design and Media
